title: Independent Venues Are At Risk - Discussion w/ Stephen Chilton from Save Our Stages
itunes:title: Independent Venues Are At Risk - Discussion w/ Stephen Chilton from Save Our Stages
description:
This is one of my most important episodes of the show. Please listen and support ALL of our local venues across the country that are at real risk from returning. I had my friend Stephen Chilton from Phoenix, Arizona who has been booking shows for many years and is part of the National Independent Venue Association. We discuss their campaign called #SaveOurStages and what he's learned through his years of promoting shows.

Please visit Saveourstages.com

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
